nimbodata.core.pg.entities.column module¶

Module implements the PostgreSQL table column.

class nimbodata.core.pg.entities.column.Column(name=None, objid=None, info=None)[source]¶

Bases: common.entities.column.Column, nimbodata.core.pg.entities.prototype.Entity

Column in a table, referenced by views. Can be used in where filter.

create(parent, name, datatype, alias=None, primary_key=None, tblinfo=None, index=None)[source]¶

Create the column in SQL, register it.

drop()[source]¶

Drop the column from the table.

modify(newtype)[source]¶

Change the type of a column.

rename(newname)¶

Rename the entity.

Should work for all implementations that use Entity.create()

select()¶

Get all children of this entity.

nimbodata.core.pg.entities.prototype module¶

Module implements the PostgreSQL Entity base class.

class nimbodata.core.pg.entities.prototype.Entity(name=None, objid=None, info=None)[source]¶

Bases: common.entities.prototype.Entity

Base class for an entity in a PostgreSQL database (in PG terms).

create(vals)[source]¶

Register an entity in the metadata registry.

Default create method for an entity - only used in conjunction with an actual implementation of an Entity - because this only registers the entity in the registry - it does not execute the entity SQL itself.

drop()[source]¶

Drop the entity.

Does not execute the actual SQL required to drop the object - just drops the entity from the registry.

ent_info = '_adm-entityinfo'¶
ent_reg = '_adm-entityregistry'¶
info[source]¶

So that we always have accurate metadata.

listing(child_type=None)[source]¶

Get all peers or children of the entity.

Called directly, it provides a list of same-type siblings.

The method also serves a __getattr__ for the lowercase plural of any entity type (i.e. Database().tables() or Table().columns()). When called via __getattr__, it will be called with the child_type converted from the attr argument.

modify(newtype)¶
rename(newname)[source]¶

Rename the entity.

Should work for all implementations that use Entity.create()

schema = '_adm-registries'¶
select()[source]¶

Get all children of this entity.

tree()[source]¶

Get all children of this entity.

Module contents¶

Module implements PostgreSQL entities as Python objects for Nimbodata.
